verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to give the more earnest <S%G4056><s%> heed <S%G4337><s%> to the things which we have heard <S%G191><s%>, lest at any time <S%G3379><s%> we should let them slip <S%G3901><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> stedfast <S%G949><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> transgression <S%G3847><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> disobedience <S%G3876><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> a just <S%G1738><s%> recompence of reward <S%G3405><s%>;

How <S%G4459><s%> shall we <S%G2249><s%> escape <S%G1628><s%>, if we neglect <S%G272><s%> so great <S%G5082><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>; which <S%G3748><s%> at the first <S%G746><s%> began <S%G2983><s%> to be spoken <S%G2980><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and was confirmed <S%G950><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> them that heard <S%G191><s%> him;

God <S%G2316><s%> also bearing them witness <S%G4901><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> with signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with divers <S%G4164><s%> miracles <S%G1411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gifts <S%G3311><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2308><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> unto the angels <S%G32><s%> hath he <S%G5293><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> put in subjection <S%G5293><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> to come <S%G3195><s%>, whereof <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we speak <S%G2980><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> in a certain place <S%G4225><s%> testified <S%G1263><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou art mindful <S%G3403><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou visitest <S%G1980><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

Thou madest <S%G1642><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a little <S%G1024><s%> <S%G5100><s%> lower <S%G1642><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%>; thou crownedst <S%G4737><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> didst set <S%G2525><s%> him <S%G846><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>:

Thou hast put <S%G5293><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> in subjection <S%G5293><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that he put <S%G5293><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> in subjection under <S%G5293><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he left <S%G863><s%> nothing that is not <S%G3762><s%> put under <S%G506><s%> him <S%G846><s%>. But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> we see <S%G3708><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> put under <S%G5293><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> was made <S%G1642><s%> a little <S%G1024><s%> <S%G5100><s%> lower <S%G1642><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the suffering <S%G3804><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%>, crowned <S%G4737><s%> with glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%>; that <S%G3704><s%> he <S%G1089><s%> by the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should taste <S%G1089><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> every man <S%G3956><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it became <S%G4241><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, for <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things <S%G3956><s%>, in bringing <S%G71><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, to make <S%G5048><s%> the captain <S%G747><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> he that sanctifieth <S%G37><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they who are sanctified <S%G37><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>: for <S%G1223><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> he is <S%G1870><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> them <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%>, I will declare <S%G518><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> unto my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> will I sing praise <S%G5214><s%> unto thee <S%G4571><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> will <S%G2071><s%> put my trust <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the children <S%G3813><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

Forasmuch <S%G1893><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as the children <S%G3813><s%> are partakers <S%G2841><s%> of flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, he <S%G3348><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> likewise <S%G3898><s%> took part <S%G3348><s%> of the same <S%G846><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he might destroy <S%G2673><s%> him that had <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G2904><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%>, that is <S%G5123><s%>, the devil <S%G1228><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> deliver <S%G525><s%> them <S%G5128><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their lifetime <S%G2198><s%> subject <S%G1777><s%> to bondage <S%G1397><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> verily <S%G1222><s%> he took <S%G1949><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> on <S%G1949><s%> him the nature of angels <S%G32><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> he took on <S%G1949><s%> him the seed <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G3606><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> it behoved him <S%G3784><s%> to be made like <S%G3666><s%> unto his brethren <S%G80><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he might be <S%G1096><s%> a merciful <S%G1655><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> in things pertaining to <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> make reconciliation for <S%G2433><s%> the sins <S%G266><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G3958><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> hath suffered <S%G3958><s%> being tempted <S%G3985><s%>, he is able <S%G1410><s%> to succour <S%G997><s%> them that are tempted <S%G3985><s%>.
